subject: Order #SSN5174 Shipment Status
description_text:
Hello,

I recently ordered the Simsonn Plus X pedals with the VAM Pro Haptic
Reactor. I received the pedals yesterday, but the tracker is showing that
the haptic reactors are still in transit. When I put the tracking number
in, the shipper's website shows that the package with the reactors haven't
been shipped yet. I just wanted to check in and confirm if they haven't
shipped yet or if there's an issue somewhere?

Thanks,
Ethan

conversations.body_text: Hi Ethan Clarke,  I apologize for not responding to you promptly. I see your package has been delivered. Have you received it?  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047195599512
